Introducing #MiMIX2 - A stunning evolution to full screen display phone from our revolutionary concept phone! Also don't forget to check out #MiNote3 and #MiNotebookPro, which is a step up from their respective predecessors.

Mi MIX 2 Special Edition
- 18:9 screen, 5.99" display 
- 12% reduced chin size
- Hidden speaker & proximity sensor 
- Snapdragon 835, up to 8GB RAM 
- Sony IMX386 sensor, 1.25Œºm large pixels 4-axis optical image stabilization
- Four-sided curved ceramic unibody
- Global LTE support, 6 modes 43 bands
